data.title: Issue installing app (signed apps)
data.text:
Hi !

Iâm wondering if somebody could point my in the right direction because I canât figure out why MDS is not installing my apps (Chrome, Audacity and Gimp).

When looking at the logs I first noticed that it was because the packages werenât signed. I then signed them using Apple Developper Certificate but I still donât have any app (even though the installation is âsuccessfulâ.

Any hints ?

Iâve made some progress with this issue in case it helps someone.

Looks like itâs the repackaging by MDS that does something funny to the app. I cannot for instance install the generated .pkg manually (it installs and says itâs successful but the application is nowhere to be found).

So what I did as a workaround is that I extract the .pkg myself from the dmg image. And then use a script in MDS to install the pkg I extracted. This worked fine (I havenât tested all the apps yet but should be OK). It means a couple of more steps for me but as I donât have many applications itâs not a big problem.

Would be good to know what the issue with the repackaging in MDS is, but I really donât see how I could have done anything wrong there as itâs a backgroud process.
